name: Scooch (Proof Of Concept)
description:
- First technical alpha release.

-DISCLAIMER: This game currently only supports Xbox pad controls. (Keyboard support coming very soon)

Welcome to Scooch. The top down car-park drifting game that has you constantly pushing for the perfect slide, the perfect turn, the perfect line that will park your caboose in that park zone as quick as possible.

- "Meat boy on wheels"

Instant restarts will have you chasing perfection, time and again.

Developer Notes:

This is a proof of concept that I, along with some collaborators at my school have put together. We are looking for all kinds of feedback! To see if Scooch has some legs to really be something great,
